verses.verse: Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> you <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak.<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

My <S%H3948>doctrine<s%> shall <S%H6201>drop<s%> as the <S%H4306>rain.<s%> My <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H5140>condense<s%> as the <S%H2919>dew,<s%> as the small <S%H8164>rain<s%> on the tender <S%H6212>grass,<s%> as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> on the <S%H6212>herb.<s%>
For I will <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> <S%H1433>greatness<s%> to our <S%H430>God!<s%>

The <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> his <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect,<s%> for all his <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H4941>justice:<s%> a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and without <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> <S%H6662>just<s%> and right is <S%H3477>he.<s%>

They have dealt <S%H7843>corruptly<s%> with <S%H3971>him.<s%> They are not his <S%H1121>children,<s%> because of their <S%H6141>defect.<s%> They are a perverse and <S%H6618>crooked<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

Do you thus <S%H1580>requite<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H2450>unwise?<s%> <S%H1>Isn't<s%> he your father who has <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H6213>you?<s%> He has made <S%H3559>you,<s%> and established you.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%> <S%H995>Consider<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and he will <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H2205>you;<s%> your elders, and they will tell <S%H559>you.<s%>

When the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5157>gave<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> their <S%H5157>inheritance,<s%> when he <S%H6504>separated<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> he <S%H5324>set<s%> the <S%H1367>bounds<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H2506>portion<s%> is his <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

He <S%H4672>found<s%> him in a <S%H4057>desert<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> in the <S%H8414>waste<s%> <S%H3214>howling<s%> <S%H3452>wilderness.<s%> He <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H995>him.<s%> He cared for <S%H5341>him.<s%> He kept him as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

As an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that stirs <S%H5782>up<s%> her <S%H7064>nest,<s%> that <S%H7363>flutters<s%> over her <S%H1469>young,<s%> he spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> his <S%H84>wings,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5375>them,<s%> he bore them on his <S%H84>feathers.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> <S%H5148>led<s%> <S%H5236>him.<s%> There was no foreign god with <S%H410>him.<s%>

He made him <S%H7392>ride<s%> on the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%> He caused him to <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> out of the <S%H2496>flinty<s%> <S%H6697>rock;<s%>

<S%H2529>Butter<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> with <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> of the <S%H1121>breed<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> with <S%H2459>the<s%> <S%H3629>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat.<s%> Of <S%H2561>the<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6025>grape<s%> you drank <S%H8354>wine.<s%>

But <S%H3484>Jeshurun<s%> grew <S%H8080>fat,<s%> and <S%H1163>kicked.<s%> You have grown <S%H8080>fat.<s%> You have grown <S%H5666>thick.<s%> You have become <S%H3780>sleek.<s%> Then he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5034>him,<s%> and lightly esteemed the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
They moved him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H3707>gods.<s%> They provoked him to anger with <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

They <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to <S%H7700>demons,<s%> not <S%H433>God,<s%> to <S%H430>gods<s%> that they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know, to <S%H2319>new<s%> gods that <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H935>up<s%> <S%H7138>recently,<s%> which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H8175>didn't<s%> dread.
Of the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> who became your <S%H3205>father,<s%> you are <S%H7876>unmindful,<s%> and have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> who gave you <S%H2342>birth.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> and <S%H5006>abhorred,<s%> because of the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H7200>them.<s%> I will see what their <S%H319>end<s%> shall <S%H8419>be;<s%> for they are a very perverse <S%H1755>generation,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> in whom is no <S%H529>faithfulness.<s%>

They have moved me to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with that which is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%> They have provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>vanities.<s%> I will move them to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with those who are not a <S%H5971>people.<s%> I will provoke them to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with a <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

For a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H3344>Burns<s%> to the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> <S%H398>Devours<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with its <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and sets the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> on <S%H3857>fire.<s%>
"I will <S%H5595>heap<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> on <S%H3615>them.<s%> I will spend my arrows on <S%H2671>them.<s%>

They shall be <S%H4198>wasted<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger,<s%> and <S%H3898>devoured<s%> with burning <S%H7565>heat<s%> and <S%H4815>bitter<s%> <S%H6986>destruction.<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of <S%H929>animals<s%> on <S%H2534>them,<s%> With the poison of <S%H2119>crawling<s%> things of the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

<S%H2351>Outside<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H7921>bereave,<s%> and in the <S%H2315>rooms,<s%> <S%H367>terror;<s%> on both young <S%H970>man<s%> and <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> The <S%H3243>nursing<s%> infant with the <S%H7872>gray-haired<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> I would scatter them <S%H6284>afar.<s%> I would make their <S%H2143>memory<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from among <S%H582>men;<s%>

were it <S%H3884>not<s%> that I <S%H1481>feared<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> lest their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> should judge <S%H5234>wrongly,<s%> lest they should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> 'Our hand is <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not done all <S%H6466>this.<s%>'"
For they are a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6>void<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel.<s%> There is no understanding in <S%H8394>them.<s%>
Oh <S%H3863>that<s%> they were <S%H2449>wise,<s%> that they <S%H7919>understood<s%> <S%H995>this,<s%> that they would consider their latter <S%H319>end!<s%>

How could <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> put <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> to <S%H5127>flight,<s%> <S%H3808>unless<s%> their <S%H6697>Rock<s%> had <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H3588>them,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had delivered them <S%H5462>up?<s%>
For their <S%H6697>rock<s%> is not as our <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> even our <S%H341>enemies<s%> themselves being <S%H6414>judges.<s%>

For their <S%H1612>vine<s%> is of the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> of the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%> Their <S%H6025>grapes<s%> are <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of <S%H7219>gall,<s%> Their <S%H811>clusters<s%> are <S%H4846>bitter.<s%>
Their <S%H3196>wine<s%> is the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of <S%H8577>serpents,<s%> The <S%H393>cruel<s%> <S%H7219>venom<s%> of <S%H6620>asps.<s%>
<S%H3647>"Isn't<s%> this laid up in store with <S%H2856>me,<s%> sealed up among my <S%H214>treasures?<s%>

<S%H5359>Vengeance<s%> is <S%H8005>mine,<s%> and recompense, at the <S%H6256>time<s%> when their <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slides;<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand.<s%> The things that are to <S%H6264>come<s%> on them shall make <S%H2363>haste.<s%>"

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and have <S%H5162>compassion<s%> on his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> that their <S%H3027>power<s%> is <S%H235>gone,<s%> There is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H6113>remaining,<s%> shut up or left at <S%H5800>large.<s%>
He will <S%H559>say,<s%> "Where are their <S%H430>gods,<s%> The <S%H6697>rock<s%> in which they took <S%H2620>refuge;<s%>

Which <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> And <S%H8354>drank<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of their drink <S%H5257>offering?<s%> Let them rise <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H5643>you!<s%> Let them be your protection.

<S%H7200>"See<s%> now that <S%H430>I,<s%> even I, am he, There is no god with <S%H4191>me.<s%> I kill, and I make <S%H2421>alive.<s%> I <S%H4272>wound,<s%> and I <S%H7495>heal.<s%> There is no one who can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
For I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And <S%H559>say,<s%> As I <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%>

if I <S%H8150>whet<s%> my <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> take <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> I will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to my <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and will <S%H7999>recompense<s%> those who hate <S%H8130>me.<s%>

I will make my <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H7937>drunk<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%> My <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> and the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> from the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6546>leaders<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>"

<S%H7442>Rejoice,<s%> you <S%H1471>nations,<s%> with his <S%H5971>people,<s%> for he will <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants.<s%> He will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And will make <S%H3722>expiation<s%> for his <S%H127>land,<s%> for his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he and <S%H1954>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7760>them,<s%> "Set your <S%H3824>heart<s%> to all the <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H5749>testify<s%> to you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> which you shall <S%H6680>command<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law.<s%>

For it is no <S%H7386>vain<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> for <S%H2416>you;<s%> because it is your life, and through this <S%H1697>thing<s%> you shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land,<s%> where you go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Go <S%H5927>up<s%> into this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> that is over <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho;<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H272>possession;<s%>

and <S%H4191>die<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> where you go <S%H5927>up,<s%> and be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H5971>people,<s%> as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people:<s%>

because you <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of Meribah of <S%H4808>Kadesh,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin;<s%> because you <S%H6942>didn't<s%> sanctify me in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> before <S%H935>you;<s%> but you shall not go there into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
